Officially introducing you to #MiMIX2S! A stunningly beautiful phone with an amazing camera, lightning fast processor, global band support and wireless charging. Also, if you love gaming, reading and music don't forget to check out our new Mi Gaming Laptop and Mi AI Speaker mini! 

Mi MIX 2S: 
- Full screen display
- AI dual camera
- 12 MP wide-angle + 12 MP telephoto
- Qualcomm Snapdragon 845
- Wireless charging
- Face unlock
- ARCore technology
- 43 Global bands

Mi Gaming Laptop:
- 15.6" wide-color gamut ultra-thin bezels
- NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060
- 7th gen Intel Core i7 processor
- 256GB SSD + 1TB HDD
- Professional gaming keyboard

Mi AI Speaker mini:
- Access to 35 million books and songs
- Intelligent voice controlled lifestyle assistant
- Smart home integration
We love all the new features that come with #MiMIX2S! What is your favorite?
